title: Portfolio Website Redesign
description: A modern and responsive redesign of my personal portfolio website, focusing on clean UI/UX and performance.

title: E-commerce Product Page
description: Developed a dynamic product page for an e-commerce platform with interactive image gallery and add-to-cart functionality.
